project_slug.title: Project folder name
project_slug.description: Filesystem-safe slug used for the output directory.

rpc_url.title: RPC HTTP URL
rpc_url.description: Animica JSON-RPC endpoint used by the widgets for reads (and optional writes).

ws_url.title: WebSocket URL
ws_url.description: Animica WebSocket endpoint for live streams like newHeads and pendingTxs.

explorer_api_url.title: Explorer API base URL
explorer_api_url.description: Optional: REST API base for explorer-specific aggregates. Leave as-is or blank to use RPC/WS only.

chain_id.title: Chain ID
chain_id.description: Numeric chain identifier to display and validate against.

site_title.title: Site title
site_title.description: Title used in the preview page and widget metadata.

theme.title: Theme
theme.description: Color theme for widgets. 'auto' follows the user's prefers-color-scheme.

notes: If explorer_api_url is unreachable, widgets gracefully fall back to RPC/WS-only mode.
You can override per-widget via data-* attributes in the embed script tag.
